words.source: H6395 conj. + Hiphil perf. 1cs of פָּלָה 'to distinguish, set apart'; KJV 'I will sever', ESV 'I will set apart', NASB 'I will set apart'
H3117 prep. b- + art. + n.ms yom 'day'; KJV 'in that day', ESV 'on that day', NASB 'on that day'
H1931 art. + dem. pron. huʾ 'that'; KJV 'that', ESV 'that', NASB 'that'
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English
H776 n.fs construct ʾerets 'land, earth'; KJV 'the land', ESV 'the land', NASB 'the land'
H1657 proper name Goshen; all trans. agree
H834 rel. pron. ʾasher 'who, which, that'; KJV 'in which', ESV 'where', NASB 'where'
H5971 n.ms construct ʿam 'people' + 1cs suff.; KJV 'my people', ESV 'my people', NASB 'My people'
H5975 Qal act. part. ms of עָמַד 'to stand'; KJV 'dwell', ESV 'live', NASB 'are living'
H5921 prep. ʿal 'upon' + 3fs suff.; KJV 'therein', ESV 'in', NASB 'in'
H1115 prep. l- + neg. particle bilti 'not, so as not'; KJV 'to the end that', ESV 'so that', NASB 'so that'
H1961 Qal inf. construct of הָיָה 'to be'; KJV 'to be', ESV 'be', NASB 'there will be'
H8033 adv. sham 'there'; KJV 'there', ESV 'there', NASB 'there'
H6157 n.ms ʿarov 'swarm (of flies)'; KJV 'swarms of flies', ESV 'swarms of flies', NASB 'swarms of insects'
H4616 prep. lemaʿan 'in order that, for the sake of'; KJV 'that', ESV 'that', NASB 'that'
H3045 Qal impf. 2ms of יָדַע 'to know'; KJV 'thou mayest know', ESV 'you may know', NASB 'you may know'
H3588 conj. ki 'that, because'; KJV 'that', ESV 'that', NASB 'that'
H589 pron. 1cs ʾani 'I'; KJV 'I am', ESV 'I am', NASB 'I am'
H3068 divine name, Tetragrammaton; KJV 'the LORD', ESV 'the LORD', NASB 'the LORD'
H7130 prep. b- + n.ms construct qerev 'midst, inward part'; KJV 'in the midst of', ESV 'in the midst of', NASB 'in the midst of'
H776 art. + n.fs ʾerets 'land, earth'; KJV 'the earth', ESV 'the earth', NASB 'the land'
